heading: 2.0.5 Patch is now Live!
content: Vessel of Hatred exmpansion and Season 6 are live for a month now, Mid-Season 6 2.0.5 Patch is now live! You can read the by clicking on the image below! We hope you enjoy the Season of Hatred Rising and the Vessel of Hatred expansion with the aid of our Season 6 compendium update. Our focus for the start of Season 6 is to make sure our are solid with all the new Item updates, new features and mechanic changes while following various Vessel of Hatred hotfixes. We're continuing to work on more updates for With that said, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development and to make the most of your Season 6 experience! Also don't forget to check out our Written by:
